Hanford.Lucerne, Kings County, California:
Lucerne is an unincorporated community in Kings County, California. It is located on the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railroad 3.5 miles (5.6 km) north of Hanford, at an elevation of 259 feet (79 m).
The name Lucerne was applied in 1887, after Lucerne, Switzerland.
